ssot__EmailMessage__dlm.name: Email Message
ssot__EmailMessage__dlm.description: The Email Message DMO represents an email message, which can be in SMS or HTML format, and attachments sent or received over the network.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated case.

ssot__ChannelEngagementNumber__c.description: The channel engagement number for the email messagel.

ssot__CountryRegion__c.description: The country or region for the email message.

ssot__CreatedById__c.description: A reference ID to the user who created the record.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CreatedDateTime___c.description: The time the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EmailHeaderText__c.description: The header text for the email message.

ssot__EmailMessageText__c.description: The message text for the email message.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the email message DMO.

ssot__EmailStatus__c.description: The status of the email message.

ssot__EmailSubjectText__c.description: The subject text for the email message.

ssot__EmailThreadId__c.description: A reference ID to the email thread the message is associated with.

ssot__EngagementChannelType__c.description: The engagement channel type for the email message.

ssot__ExternalBCCEmailAddressListText__c.description: The external BCC email address list for the email message.

ssot__FirstOpenDate__c.description: The date the message was first opened.

ssot__FromAddress__c.description: The from address of the email message.

ssot__FromName__c.description: The from name of the email message.

ssot__HasRelatedDocument__c.description: An indicator if the email message has a related document.

ssot__HTMLBodyText__c.description: The HTML body text for the email message.

ssot__InternalBCCEmailAddressListText__c.description: The internal BCC email address list for the email message.

ssot__InternalCCEmailAddressListText__c.description: The internal CC email address list for the email message.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the email message.

ssot__IsBounced__c.description: An indicator if the email message has bounced.

ssot__IsIncoming__c.description: An indicator if the email message is an incoming message.

ssot__IsOpened__c.description: An indicator if the email message has been opened.

ssot__IsPrivateDraft__c.description: An indicator if the email message is a private draft.

ssot__IsTracked__c.description: An indicator if the email message is tracked.

ssot__LastModifiedById__c.description: A reference ID to the user that made the last update.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LastestOpenDate__c.description: The date the message was opened last.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivity__c.description: The market journey activity for the email message.

ssot__MessageDate__c.description: The date the email message was sent.

ssot__MessagePurpose__c.description: The purpose for the email message.

ssot__RelatedToId__c.description: A reference ID to the related item for the email message.

ssot__RelatedToObject__c.description: The related object for the message.

ssot__ReplyToAddress__c.description: The reply to address for the email message.

ssot__ReplyToEmailMessageId__c.description: A reference ID to the reply to message for the email message.

ssot__SoftwareApplication__c.description: The software application for the email message.

ssot__Subject__c.description: The subject for the email message.

ssot__ToEmailAddressListText__c.description: The to email address list for the email message.
